definitions.definition: Violent derangement of mind ; madness ; insanity .
Excessive or unreasonable desire ; insane passion affecting one or many people; fanaticism .
The state of abnormally elevated or irritable mood , arousal , and/or energy levels .

main_definition: Violent derangement of mind ; madness ; insanity .
secondary_definitions: Excessive or unreasonable desire ; insane passion affecting one or many people; fanaticism .
( psychiatry ) The state of abnormally elevated or irritable mood , arousal , and/or energy levels .
